name: Intricard
description:
You are enslaved by an eldritch entity. Manipulate stone cards to execute the ritual it needs. Maybe then it will finally let you go...

(Better in fullscreen)

Bug warning: If a card doesn't seem to register, try to drag outside of the altar then back

A game by Sigitang

Music by NuageSolitaire: https://www.youtube.com/c/CleliaFIANI/

Thanks to Piapiou, Jabberino, Frisbee & LaPelle for the playtesting. Thanks LeBlizzard for the emotional support.

How to play (do the ingame tutorial, then if you don't get it, read this):

1) Drag and drop cards on Altars

2) Cards produce symbols when provided with blood 

3) One card can produce multiple symbols if enought blood is provided

4) Unlock the required symbols to win the level !

Palette by: SalamiChild
